entry.sentence: And when the young couple left the wedding table , Magnus led his young , beautiful wife into his newly refurbished villa .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC And) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (DT the) (JJ young) (NN couple)) (VP (VBD left) (NP (DT the) (NN wedding) (NN table))))) (, ,) (NP (NNP Magnus)) (VP (VBD led) (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ young) (, ,) (JJ beautiful) (NN wife)) (PP (IN into) (NP (PRP$ his) (ADJP (RB newly) (VBN refurbished)) (NN villa)))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: With a devout feeling of happiness , Rosemarie strode at her husband 's side through the rooms , which had been furnished in a wedding-like manner .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN With) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ devout) (NN feeling)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN happiness))))) (, ,) (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VBD strode) (PP (IN at) (NP (NP (PRP$ her) (NN husband) (POS 's)) (NN side))) (PP (IN through) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS rooms)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN been) (VP (VBN furnished) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT a) (JJ wedding-like) (NN manner))))))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: `` Now at last I have found a home after my own heart , my beloved husband .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (`` ``) (ADVP (RB Now)) (PP (IN at) (NP (JJ last))) (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP have) (VP (VBN found) (NP (DT a) (NN home)) (PP (IN after) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ own) (NN heart)) (, ,) (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ beloved) (NN husband)))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: I want to thank you for it with every breath , '' she said fervently .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP want) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB thank) (NP (PRP you)) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP it))) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT every) (NN breath)))))))) (, ,) ('' '') (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD said) (NP (NNS fervently))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Magnus pulled his young wife tightly to him .

entry.sentence: `` Thank me by your love , my Rosemarie , and by making you feel happy in your new home .

entry.sentence: And their lips found each other in a long , intimate kiss .
